title: cryptopher1
author: cryptopher1
created_time: October 04, 2022, 01:56:13 PMLast edit: October 06, 2022, 11:09:28 AM by cryptopher1
content: Hello everyone,I want to introduce you to my new service. Contact me to help with development of marketing plans for your crypto projects (including online and offline marketing campaigns. I have experience as a marketer with real crypto projects especially exchanges. In my plan I will research and give you a marketing plan aimed at driving your brand awareness and increase conversion rates. The marketing plans can be broken down into 1 to 3 months plan/activities. Thereafter, we evaluate the effectiveness of plans put in place, learn on things to improve and chart a course for the next quarter. Contact me Telegram @BTCJazz01

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: cryptopher1 on October 04, 2022, 01:56:13 PMHello everyone,I want to introduce you to my new service. Contact me to help with development of marketing plans for your crypto projects (including online and offline marketing campaigns. I have experience as a marketer with real crypto projects especially exchanges. In my plan I will research and give you a marketing plan aimed at driving your brand awareness and increase conversion rates. The marketing plans can be broken down into 1 to 3 months plan/activities. Thereafter, we evaluate the effectiveness of plans put in place, learn on things to improve and chart a course for the next quarter. Contact me Telegram @BTCJazz01Which marketing will you do? You will do email marketing, social media marketing, or any other marketing? If you do email marketing and then have your own server, do you have to take rent the server or you will take the server from the client? Also, your service is available only for a crypto project or any type of project.

comments.author: cryptopher1

You will do email marketing, social media marketing, or any other marketing? If you do email marketing and then have your own server, do you have to take rent the server or you will take the server from the client? Also, your service is available only for a crypto project or any type of project. Thank you for your questions. I focus on almost all angles of including email marketing, social media marketing and other channels as per the client's project. Even in some instances, assist in organizing offline campaigns e.g use of billboards, street activation plans etc. I use the client's servers atm. I am open to projects beyond the crypto space. HMU on Telegram @BTCJazz01

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Seems brand new account which is quite hard to trust. Can you add more details about where have worked previously? Can you post your portfolio here? How many projects successfully worked on with you? A lot of questions are on my mind. So better add your portfolio here and make a professional announcement of your service. Otherwise, you won't get any clients from here. Because there are a lot of experienced people around the forum who are helping projects successfully.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: cryptopher1 on December 01, 2022, 08:13:41 PMActiveI am available to work on email marketing, social media marketing, link building, search engine optimization, and mailing list development. If you need any help in this service then you may contact me by message on the forum, by commenting here, or by sending me a message on my telegram. Note: My telegram id is mentioned on my profile.
